text: Then Harbonah, one of the eunuchs who were with the king, said, “Behold, the gallows fifty cubits7:9 A cubit is the length from the tip of the middle finger to the elbow on a man’s arm, or about 18 inches or 46 centimeters. high, which Haman has made for Mordecai, who spoke good for the king, is standing at Haman’s house.”
